title: Sono Mono. Nochi ni...: Futsuu no Otoko, Saikyou no Michi wo Yuku.
original_name: その者。のちに…～フツーの男、最強の道を往く。～
sinopse: Wazu was an ordinary townsman who shut himself off in the "mountain" because of an unfortunate course of events. After 2 years in seclusion, he decided to come down from the mountain...
